Episodes.Title: Amber Waves
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: After witnessing Elizabeth kill two men, Paige trades in church for training sessions with mom. First, self defense. Second could tear the family apart. The beginning of the end for Paige and Matthew looms.

Episodes.Title: Pests
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Stan and Oleg wrestle with the harsh consequences of their complicated history, as Philip and Elizabeth face a new mission with devastating implications for their country.

Episodes.Title: The Midges
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth tell Paige more about the family business, but pressing new questions arise when an operation takes a ghastly and unexpected turn. Meanwhile, a sensitive package jeopardizes Oleg's life back home.

Episodes.Title: What's the Matter with Kansas?
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth have qualms about a new assignment, while a specter from Philip's past creates unforeseen dangers. At the FBI, Stan makes a shocking play that could throw his career into turmoil.

Episodes.Title: Lotus 1-2-3
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth receive surprising news about Henry -- and shattering news about a past operation. Stan might be falling in love, but Philip wonders if something darker is going on.

Episodes.Title: Crossbreed
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Phillip and Elizabeth are stunned by Gabriel with a sudden announcement and a crushing revelation about Philip's past; Stan and Aderholt lure a suspect into their web; Oleg and Ruslan lead their first target into an ambush.

Episodes.Title: The Committee on Human Rights
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: As Paige becomes even more enmeshed in her parents' world, tensions with Matthew Beeman come to a head, Philip and Elizabeth's honeytraps take surprising turns, and Stan faces the consequences of overplaying his hand at the FBI.

Episodes.Title: Immersion
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: A secret brings Elizabeth and Paige together, while, in Moscow, Oleg's own secrets put him under KGB suspicion. A new twist in the Morozov operation creates an opportunity that changes everything.

Episodes.Title: IHOP
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth are thrown off balance when things with Tuan take an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Henry makes a startling proposition and Stan has a disturbing encounter with Frank Gaad's widow.

Episodes.Title: Darkroom
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Paige's snooping leads Philip and Elizabeth to make a choice that could shift the balance of their lives forever. Stan and Aderholt's recruitment of Sofia suddenly bears fruit.

Episodes.Title: Dyatkovo
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: A surprise assignment from the Centre divides Philip and Elizabeth, forcing them into a moment of profound crisis. Stan gives Henry a tour of the FBI -- but will he see too much?

Episodes.Title: The World Council of Churches
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: As Philip and Elizabeth grapple with a momentous decision, Tuan takes matters into his own hands in the Morozov operation. Back in Russia, Oleg's investigation collides with the realities of the Soviet system.

Episodes.Title: The Soviet Division
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Brandon J. Dirden
Episodes.Plot: Phillip and Elizabeth race against the clock as a life hangs in the balance, while Stan faces an uncertain future.
